mapper.select: SELECT id, title, start_Date startDate, end_Date endDate, create_Date createDate, description, task_Count taskCount, viewrange_Type viewrangeType, weixin_Gd weixinGd, weixin_Ls weixinLs, weixin_Apk weixinApk, weixin_Other weixinOther, apk_Url apkUrl, other_Url otherUrl, state FROM wx_manage_task t WHERE t.isdelete = 0 AND (t.viewrange_Type = 'All' OR (t. viewrange_Type = 'SELECT' AND T.id IN (SELECT task_id FROM wx_user_viewrange v WHERE v.user_id IN (SELECT u.id FROM wx_user u WHERE FIND_IN_SET(u.id, queryUpUser(#{userId})) AND u.upuser_id IS NOT NULL))))
